Subject: Successful Sign-In Alert from a New Location

Dear [User],

We are writing to inform you that your Microsoft account has been successfully signed in from a new location. The sign-in occurred on [Date] at [Time] from the following location:

Location: [City], [Country]
IP Address: [XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX]

If you did not initiate this sign-in or if you believe your account has been compromised, please take immediate action to secure your account. We recommend changing your password and enabling two-factor authentication to add an extra layer of security to your account.

If you have any concerns or questions regarding this sign-in alert, please do not hesitate to contact our support team.

Thank you for choosing Microsoft.

Sincerely,
Microsoft Security Team
